chapter.title: Cockpit API
chapter.para: Cockpit has API available for writing packages. There is no API available for external callers to invoke via HTTP, REST or otherwise.

warning.para: It is not yet possible to implement arbitrary new packages.
Unless an API is explicitly marked as stable, it is unstable and can be changed when Cockpit is upgraded.

section.title: API Listing
section.para: There is currently no API available.
